Hey everybody!! for the 6th way I have a suggestion!! Take a particularly 
solid frying pan, preferably iron skillet, and bash yourself really hard in 
the face a couple of times. If you start to see blood on the pan, that just 
means you're doing the procedure perfectly!! Afterwards, not just your lips 
will swell but your whole face as well. If you lose conscientiousness don't 
worry, your lips will stay plump for a good week. Good Luck!!!﻿

one. It is so dangerous, people have blown blood vessels in their lips from

shouldn't have to scrape at your lips with a toothbrush to fit in with 
society's obsession with big lips! Please be safe!💓💓﻿
